summary: Frontend-only testing of UI refinement changes to the Alt Tracker at /alt-tracker. All 7 feature requirements verified and passing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Alt-tracker UI refinements complete: Pascal AI logo (two overlapping rectangles - dark teal outline #0d4d57 + green filled #3a9e7e), white Add Company button, green send button (#3a9e7e) with white up arrow, # prefix for sectors/categories and @ prefix for column names in chat bar badges, focused placeholder shows 'Use # for sectors/categories, @ for columns...', tutorial slide appears every ~40 seconds in rotation showing styled # and @ symbols with usage instructions.

tests_passed.1_pascal_ai_logo: PASSED - Two overlapping rectangles SVG found in header (rect1: stroke=#0d4d57/fill=none, rect2: fill=#3a9e7e)
tests_passed.2_add_company_white_button: PASSED - Add Company button has white background (rgb(255, 255, 255)) with border
tests_passed.3_green_send_button: PASSED - Send button is green (#3a9e7e / rgb(58, 158, 126)) with rounded corners (10px) and white arrow
tests_passed.4_hash_prefix_badges: PASSED - Sector/category badges show # prefix (e.g., '#Telemedicine') with lower opacity styling
tests_passed.5_at_prefix_badges: PASSED - Column name badges show @ prefix (e.g., '@Customer Wins') with lower opacity styling
tests_passed.6_focused_placeholder_text: PASSED - Focused placeholder shows 'Use # for sectors/categories, @ for columns...'
tests_passed.7_tutorial_slide_rotation: PASSED - Tutorial slide found at rotation 10 showing 'Type # to select a sector or category and @ to select a column name' with styled symbol boxes
tests_passed.8_main_tracker_unchanged: PASSED - Main tracker at / shows 'Growth Equity Fund Tracker' with different layout, no Pascal AI logo, no chat bar changes
